news: Beat the cold this January with a new drum set!
Someone broke your heart strings!  Upgrade with a new guitar!
March to the beat of your favorite drums!
Spring into something new with a new DJ turntable!
Get ready for the summer with cool keyboard!
Jammin' with the band this weekend?  Show 'em what you can do with that bass guitar you've always wanted!
Burned your favorite drumsticks in the bonfire last night?  We've got you covered.
Wishing you chill summer vibes.  Enjoy it while it lasts!
Who needs school anyways?  We prefer the school of rock!
You deserve a gift for yourself this month.  Don't worry, we won't tell anyone.
Show the family your skills on Thanksgiving with a new piano!
Happy holidays from everyone here at Demo Company!
